prompt_enter_psd_filename: Enter the base PSD file name (another file will use Avatar_Longcoat.psd in the src folder):
prompt_enter_chair_image: Enter the chair image name (the chair width should exceed 250 pixels):
info_auto_align_selected: You selected the Auto Align function
info_convert_psd_to_gif_selected: You selected the Convert PSD to GIF function (it is recommended to merge the layers first to speed up loading time, and make sure the layers in the PSD file are aligned)
info_make_big_chair_selected: You selected the Make Big Chair function
prompt_enter_2nd_psd_filename: Enter the second PSD file name(Default:src/Avatar_Longcoat.psd):
